name: Doomsday Contact
description:
Doomsday Contact is a FPS tactical shooter game which allows you to be deployed in a operation as a special forces and fight the monsters and complete the objective for extraction. You must do what it takes to complete the mission and save the world!

This game includes:
- Gun Customization

-Play offline without internet connection

-Freely walk around the map

-Choose your own way to complete the mission

To talk to other people playing this game and keep up with it's development, make sure to join our Discord server!

Discord link: https://discord.gg/U9eBuvwUua

P.S. We are a two mem indie game studio and have worked on this game for a while. It would be really great for us if you enjoy our game!
